title: Does MMR reset
body: At the end of the season does mmr reset with the ranks or do you keep your mmr?

replies.body:
It does not completely reset, instead it undergoes a soft reset (which has happened the last couple of seasons).

During a soft reset your MMR will be a few divisions lower than where you ended last season, and your placements will go off of that. Almost everyone ends up starting with a rank that was lower than what they ended the previous season.
